channel.title: Emotion in Motion with Charlotte D Blignaut
channel.managingEditor: emotioninmotion@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Emotion In Motion | Solid Gold Studios)
channel.copyright: Â© Solid Gold Studios - all rights reserved
channel.description: Open-minded mindfulness - exploring the change in Mindsets required and the relationship with evolving Consciousness in our world. Including various options shared for coping, plus bonus in learning how to expand your own consciousness. We discuss, coach or chat, with our audience and with various guests, who are seen as leaders of change, where change has been embraced, is prevalent and working well. Uncovering and sharing the many varied ways and means for improving inner-balance, joy and creating authenticity of our live's life within.
channel.itunes:subtitle: How You Communicate is How You Succeed
channel.itunes:author: Charlotte D. Blignaut | Emotion in Motion | Solid Gold Studios
channel.itunes:summary: The Naked Soul - getting passionately deep and naked with your Soul and Mind. Experience the ultimate marriage ~ of your Mind, Heart and Soul, it's your destiny!
channel.itunes:keywords: Charlotte D Blignaut, Emotion in Motion, hidden genius superpower, another Solid Gold podcast, Gavin Kennedy

item.author: emotioninmotion@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Charlotte D Blignaut | Solid Gold Studios)
item.itunes:author: Charlotte D Blignaut | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Naked, No masks, for Success
item.itunes:title: Naked, No masks, for Success
item.itunes:subtitle: How to Discover Your Hidden Genius SuperPower
item.description:
Lets unpack to your Naked soul! A short introduction to the Expose' of your Genius, with YOUR unique #body4brains Only for the Bravehearted and EXCITED future leaders... Understanding that you are much more than your Mind, and you take much more than Mind into your life, is exhilarating! Why exhilarating? Imagine that you have not yet touched on the surface of who you really are, and what you are still capable of! You are a treasure chest and you have your own personal MAGICAL Unicorn! Ask me how, lets connect and reveal your full NAKED Soul to you, and support you as you step into your Niche, with PASSION! PS - Recently done at a PechaKucha event, WOWed by the response of those who really are brave TO engage in further conversations...watch this space for what's comming!


Watch the full episode with pictures! click here


For much more information, and useful resources, visit http://charlottedblignaut.co.za


Find out more about making your own podcast at SolidGoldStudios.co.za

item.itunes:keywords: #body4brains, #inspire2Transform, #yourhiddenGeniusSuperPower, #pechakucha, #nakedSoul, Mindset, mindsetshifts, body, mind, profits, confidence, innovation, Another Solid Gold Podcast, Gavin Kennedy, #BeHeard

item.itunes:author: Charlotte D Blignaut | Solid Gold Studios
item.title: Are your Mindsets keeping YOU, YOUR Business, YOUR Life super small?
item.itunes:subtitle: Did you know? - Neuroscience proves you can change the mindsets you want to,
item.description:
DID YOU KNOW? - Challenging your own Mindsets has never been this easy. Its about your perspective and its about the parts of you that truly DESIRE behaviour and thinking changes. You can relearn how to think. But you have to be willing to have fun, laugh at self and with self, and be open to embracing an open mind. AND if Self Mastery and Self Actualisation is what you aspire to, then this is a podcast you do not want to miss! Is that you? Do you want to become more profitable as a person? Do you want to love and live openly with your Hidden Genius SuperPower? Your comments and feedback are encouraged! Together we can do anything! Together we are stronger!

For more information visit SolidGoldStudios.co.za/emotioninmotion
item.itunes:summary: DID YOU KNOW? - Challenging your own Mindsets has never been this easy. item.itunes:keywords: Self Mastery, Self Actualisation, Your Hidden Genius SuperPower, personal profiler, body4brains, coaching, neuroscience, neuroplasticity, thought leaders, profit

item.itunes:author: Charlotte D Blignaut | Solid Gold Studios

item.description:
